channel.title: Red Mesa - A Half-Life Inspired Cryengine 2 Level
channel.description:
This is not a level by me, but Crymod member Florry. I was the voice actor for this level.
Red Mesa is a Half-Life inspired level for Cryengine 2. It's not intended to be a remake of Half-Life (Note: 'Inspired'), it's neither intended to compete with Black Mesa Source.
The release date is set for 30.08.09
Check out the thread for the level here: [url]https://www.crymod.com/thread.php?threadid=14149&threadview=0&hilight=&hilightuser=0&page=1[/url]
Here's a gameplay video from the level: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lr26geDCbOM[/url]
Please note that this has been developed by one person not a team.

item.title: Red Mesa - A Half-Life Inspired Cryengine 2 Level
item.dc:creator: JonasBecsan
item.description:
λdam:

Well…
I’ll just have to see won’t I?

Well, the game Crysis requires alot of the computer because of the huge outdoor environments. Red Mesa is mostly indoor environments so it doesn’t require as much.

item.title: Red Mesa - A Half-Life Inspired Cryengine 2 Level
item.dc:creator: JonasBecsan
item.description:
λdam:

Will Look.
Feel Bad.

It actually looks really nice.
I don’t have a PC with good enough Graphics to play the game that is required.

As a betatester I can happily announce that this level looks stunning on low settings as well.

item.description:
This is not a level by me, but Crymod member Florry. I was the voice actor for this level.

Red Mesa is a Half-Life inspired level for Cryengine 2. It’s not intended to be a remake of Half-Life (Note: ‘Inspired’), it’s neither intended to compete with Black Mesa Source.

The release date is set for 30.08.09

Check out the thread for the level here: https://www.crymod.com/thread.php?threadid=14149&threadview=0&hilight=&hilightuser=0&page=1

Here’s a gameplay video from the level:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lr26geDCbOM

Please note that this has been developed by one person not a team.
